description: Gov. Nikki R. Haley, Republican of South Carolina, on Monday called for removal of a Confederate battle flag from the State Capitol grounds.
title: Gov. Haley on Removing Confederate Flag
title_page: Gov. Haley on Removing Confederate Flag - Video - NYTimes.com
text: Gov. Nikki R. Haley, Republican of South Carolina, on Monday called for removal of a Confederate battle flag from the State Capitol grounds.
